pullrequest.title: Parser: add boolean parameter to `readFile` and `readString` for disabling conversion to latest SDF spec.

content.raw:
I’m not sure if I understand the ramifications of this…

Is this flag only really useful if you’re not using the DOM? \(e.g. Gazebo Classic?\)

If you’re using the DOM, then not converting seems like it could hurt you? \(in that the DOM parsing would fail?\)
content.html:
I’m not sure if I understand the ramifications of this…

Is this flag only really useful if you’re not using the DOM? (e.g. Gazebo Classic?)

If you’re using the DOM, then not converting seems like it could hurt you? (in that the DOM parsing would fail?)
